item.description: Our featured speaker at the May 11 meeting will be Warren Tuttle, the "guru of housewares", featured in the March 2009 issue of Inventors Digest. Warren last spoke at IANE in September 2007. Warren works with independent inventors and has brought to market such highly successful products as "Smart Spin" and "Misto". He is now the external product liaison for Lifetime Brands, (e.g., Faberware, Kitchenaid, Cuisinart), the #1 supplier of kitchenware in the world. www.lifetimebrands.com. Reach Warren at 203-594-8808 or wwtuttle@yahoo.com.
item.name: Inventors Association of New England May Meetup
